message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, in the "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" section, I can see the line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 324677.57. This represents the cash payments made to acquire property, plant and equipment (fixed assets).

This is the only line item in the cash flow statement that relates to the acquisition of long-term assets.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '324677.57'}}
```
